summary:
This mod adds a house for the player next to the Alchemist\'s Shack, this mod has been
designed for players oriented toward the class \"pure mage\" so are all absent
supplies to create armor for now.
descriptionHtml:
[img=center]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/3303692-1330342229.jpg[/img]



[color=yellow][size=32][font=\"Planewalker\"][center]Description:[/center][/font][/size][/color]
[center]======================[/center]

[center]This mod adds a house for the player next to the Alchemist\'s Shack, this mod has been
designed for players oriented toward the class \"pure mage\" so are all absent
supplies to create armor for now. The key is located under the bed in the Alchemist\'s
Shack. The \"house\" consists of 5 rooms plus a garden and can be accessed once
obtained the key using the Teleport spell.[/center]

[color=yellow][center]The mod is complete at 50%, Future implementations are: Portal Chamber, New NPC: Mana wyrm, Improved lighting system, Better performance, Chest
Sorting, Aboma Core, More Spell.[/center][/color]

[color=red][center]IMPORTANT: THE TELEPORT SPELL IS A TEST, IF USED DURING A QUEST CAN BREAK THE GAME.[/color][/center]

[center][youtube]z2Fpb66wbLg[/youtube][/center]

[size=12][font=\"ringbearer\"]Features:[/font][/size]

- 6 Bookshelves 
- 19 Safe containers
- 7 Display cases
- Teleport spell
- 2 Mannequins
- Arcane enchanter
- Alchemy lab
- New book (Origin of the Mages Guild)
- Garden(Aboma Cave)

[size=32][font=\"Planewalker\"]Install:[/font][/size]

- Extract into your Data folder
- At the Skyrim start-up menu, select \"Data Files\"
- Double-click the ACY.esp file so that the box is checked
- Press \"Ok\"
- Play The Game

[size=32][font=\"Planewalker\"]Location:[/font][/size]

[img=center]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/3303692-1330285929.jpg[/img]

[size=32][font=\"Planewalker\"]Uninstall:[/font][/size]

1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s).
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

[size=32][font=\"Planewalker\"]Upgrade:[/font][/size]

1. Back up your saves
2. Before upgrading, remove all items
3. Uninstall old version
4. Install new version
5. Start Skyrim

[size=32][font=\"Planewalker\"]Compatibility:[/font][/size]

This mod should also be compatible with any mods that don\'t alter the Alchemist\'s Shack.

[size=32][font=\"Planewalker\"]Bugs:[/font][/size]

- Companions will not follow you in the Hideout.
- Floating mannequins

[size=32][font=\"Planewalker\"]History:[/font][/size]

0.5, 2012/2/26 - Garden, Mannequins and More Bookshelves Added
0.1, 2012/2/15 - Initial release.[OLD]

[size=32][font=\"Planewalker\"]Contact:[/font][/size]

You can send me an email here: Tuxemax@gmail.com


[size=32][font=\"Planewalker\"]Credits:[/font][/size]

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to SkyrimNexus for hosting this mod.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator.

[size=32][font=\"Planewalker\"]Licensing/Legal:[/font][/size]

You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of
this mod.
author: Tuxemax
